description.text: You wield a great power at the grasp of your hands, to use it You'll need 4 chains and the locket to craft an amulet, These have what's called the Power of Three. Clicking on a block you get all three levels, however hitting an entity, If it amulet is a positive effect you get 2 level and the target gets one, and if it is a negative effect the target gets 2 levels and you get one
